questionInfo.stem: Ⅳ. 听短文，选择正确答案。短文读两遍。（5分）

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：C

题意：“你有一个国际长途电话。”“谢谢。电话是我姨妈打来的。”第一个空泛指“一个长途电话”，应用不定冠词，international以元音音素开头，故用an；第二个空特指刚刚提到的电话，用定冠词。
questionInfo.stem:
—Here is _____international call for you.
—Thank you. _____call is from my aunt.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：B

题意：“戴维又应得男子跳高比赛。”“不奇怪。谁能跟她一样跳那么高？”as…as…结构中用形容词或副词原形，所以排除C、D项；修饰动词jump，表示具体意义的“高”，应用high，故选B。highly“高度地”，表示抽象意义。
questionInfo.stem:
—David won men's high jump again.
—No surprise. Who else can jump_______he does?

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：B

题意：“你见过我的眼镜了吗？没有眼镜我没法看书。”“我看见在书桌上，但现在不在那儿了。”第一空询问是否“见过”，对现在有影响，故用现在完成时；第二空，从后半句可以推测出，“看见”是过去的动作，故用一般过去时。
questionInfo.stem:
—____________ my glasses? I can’t read without them.
—I ____________ them on the desk, but they are not there now.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：C

题意：“今天好冷。你介意我关上门吗？”“当然不。做你想做的。”mind后接动名词作宾语，my closing是动名词的复合结构；根据“so cold”及“Do it as you like”可知，答语表示“不介意”，故选C。
questionInfo.stem:
— It’s so cold today. Would you mind ____________ the door?
— ____________. Do it as you like.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：D

题意：“怀特先生跟琼结婚多久了？” “我不确定。可能他们五年前结婚的。”第一空，根据how long可知应用现在完成时，be married to sb.“与某人结婚”，是固定用法；第二空，表示“结婚”应用get married。
questionInfo.stem:
—How long has Mr. White __________ Joan?
—I’m not sure. Maybe they __________ five years ago.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：A

题意：我觉得你应该花尽可能多的时间学习数学和英语。spend time doing sth.“花费时间做某事”，是固定用法。
questionInfo.stem: I think you should spend as much time as you can_____ Maths and English.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：C

题意：琳达不知道跟谁说她的问题。talk about sth. to sb.“与某人谈论某事”，是固定用法；本句是“疑问词+不定式”结构，作know的宾语，故用who to talk to。
questionInfo.stem: Linda doesn’t know __________about her problems.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：D

题意：“一定是吉姆在隔壁唱歌。”“不可能是他。他已经去上海度假了。”根据后一句“去了上海度假”可知，表示有把握的否定推测，故用can’t“不可能”。mustn’t“禁止”；needn’t“不必”；shouldn’t“不应该”。
questionInfo.stem:
— It must be Jim singing next door.
— It ________ be him. He has already gone to Shanghai on holiday.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：D

题意：“你觉得我对这个问题的答案怎么样？”“抱歉。我在想其他事情。”根据“sorry”可知，“想其他事”是刚才正在进行的动作，故用过去进行时。
questionInfo.stem:
— What do you think of my answer to the question?
— Sorry. I ________ about something else.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：C

题意：“你爸爸从来没去过其他国家，是吧？”“不，他去过。他打算再出国一次。”根据答语第二句可知，此处表示“他去过”；反意疑问句的陈述部分是否定形式，故答语选C。
questionInfo.stem:
—Your father’s never been to other countries, has he?
— ________. He plans to go abroad for a second time.

item.content: has gone to; has been to
has gone to; has been in
has been to; has been in
has been in; has gone to

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：C

题意：“史密斯先生在哪里？”“他去了广州。他在广州待了一个周了。”表示“去了某地”用have been to，故排除A、B两项；第二空，根据“for a week”可知，表示持续的动作或状态，故用has been in。
questionInfo.stem:
— Where is Mr. Smith?
— He ________ Guangzhou. He ________ Guangzhou for a week.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：D

题意：“刘老师是一位有丰富教学经验的老师吗？”“是的。他课后总是告诉我们一些有趣的经历。”experience表示“经验”是不可数名词，表示“经历”时是可数名词，故第一空填experience；第二空前有some修饰，故填experiences。
questionInfo.stem:
—Is Mr. Liu a teacher with a lot of teaching ________?
—Yes, he is. He always tells us some funny ________ after class.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：D

题意：他无法清楚地说明他买这辆自行车多长时间了。根据how long可知，应用现在完成时，且应用持续性动词，故选D。
questionInfo.stem: He can’t state clearly how long he has _________ the bicycle.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：C

题意：“我必须现在铺床吗，妈妈？”“不，不必。你可以晚点铺。”回答must的一般疑问句，否定回答用needn’t或don’t have to；表示“可以”用may。mustn’t“禁止”；must“必须”。
questionInfo.stem:
—Must I make the bed now, Mum?
—No, you _______. You _______ do it later.

questionInfo.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：B

题意：“莉莉，你帮了我很多。谢谢。”“不客气。”对别人的道谢应用my pleasure“别客气，不用谢”。A项意为“当然不”；C项意为“很乐意”；D项意为“放松点”。
questionInfo.stem:
—Lily, you’ve helped me a lot. Thanks.
— ____________.

item.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：B

由句意可知，龙虾在暴风雨天里准备航行，这让螃蟹感到很吃惊，故选B项。

您选择的答案：

正确答案：D

此处是It is+adj.+to do sth.句型。it在句中作形式主语。

您选择的答案：

正确答案：A

由文章第一句“On a stormy day, the crab walked on the beach.”可知，这是一个暴风雨的天气，故选A项。

您选择的答案：

正确答案：C

此处指螃蟹不想龙虾独自去冒险。alone意为“独自”，符合句意。

您选择的答案：

正确答案：C

本句主语为they，其反身代词为themselves。句意：他们发现他们自己离岸边很远了。

您选择的答案：

正确答案：B

上下句为转折关系，应用转折连词but。

您选择的答案：

正确答案：D

句意:螃蟹开始思念在海岸上平静的生活。miss意为“思念”，符合句意。

您选择的答案：

正确答案：A

be full of...意为“充满……”，为固定搭配。

您选择的答案：

正确答案：B

龙虾拉着他放松地在海底走着。relaxing修饰名词walk。

您选择的答案：

正确答案：C

此处考查感叹句，因所填写词修饰可数名词adventure, adventure前有wonderful修饰，故用what a。

questionInfo.stem:
On a stormy day, the crab(螃蟹) walked on the beach. He was 　1　 to see the lobster(龙虾) preparing to start a sail in his boat. “Lobster,” said the crab, “　　2　 is dangerous to take an adventure on a day like this.” 
“Perhaps so,” said the lobster, “but I love the 　3　 at sea!” “I will come with you,” said the crab. “I will not let you face such danger 　4　.” 
The lobster and the crab began their trip. Soon they found 　5　 far from the shore. Their boat was tossed(上下摇动) by the strong waves. “Crab!”shouted the lobster. “For me, the strong waves are thrilling! 　6　 they make me excited. I like to try different things.” “Lobster, I think we are sinking,” cried the crab. He began to 　7　 the peaceful life he had on the beach. 
“Yes, of course we are sinking,” said the lobster. “This old boat is full 　8　 holes. Be brave, my dear friend. We can overcome the difficulties.” 
The little boat turned over and sank. The crab was upset. The lobster took him for a 　9　 walk in the sea. “How brave we are,” said the lobster. “　10　 wonderful adventure we have had.” The crab began to feel excited. He enjoyed the adventure and their courage very much.

主旨大意题。本文主要介绍了威廉王子的新工作——空中救护飞行员，故选A项。
item.stem: What is the best title for the passage?

questionInfo.stem:
Prince William got a new job as an air ambulance pilot on Monday. He felt nervous but excited about his new job.
Prince William has got the training from traffic accidents to heart attacks before his new job. Then he started to work for East Anglian Air Ambulance(东盎格鲁空中救护). Though he has the charity job, William will continue his royal(王室的) duties. As an air ambulance pilot, he will work for nine and a half hours per day in the first few months. He will work four days and then have four days off. He will work less in the future.
“I think doing a job like this really helps me a lot and that’s part of my dream,” William said. “I’m trying to be a good man, to do what I can and trying to help others.” The prince will give his salary to charities. He said he was happy to be able to help others.

You will be very happy when your goal comes true.

item.stem: Which of the following is NOT true according to the passage?

item.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：B

主旨大意题。本文主要讲述了保持愉快心情的方法。
item.stem: The passage mainly tells us <u>　　　</u>.

questionInfo.stem:
Everyone feels unhappy sometimes. But it’s not a good idea to stay in those bad feelings. If you learn how to keep yourself happy, you’ll likely avoid a lot of problems.
★ Talk to your parents, friends or teachers, and tell them what is going on. It is amazing how much better you feel after talking about your problems.
★ Do something you enjoy, like reading novels, listening to music, or even sleeping.
★ Play a sport you enjoy. This will improve your mood.
★ Keep a “Happy Moments” journal where you write down your best memories, successes, and the moments you felt great. When you feel down, read them and remember how great you are.
★ Go for a 15-minute run, then take a nice shower, and pick out a new movie to watch!
★ Do something crazy. Dance in the dark. Scream as loud as you can. Eat a big bowl of something you know you shouldn’t.
★ Think about your goals in life, and how happy you’ll be when you complete them.

item.stem: Where were the people when Huan Jing killed the monster?

item.content: They stay at home and cook delicious food.
They climb a mountain with the young.
They climb a mountain to kill the monster.
They show their love and respect to the elderly.

item.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：D

细节理解题。由最后一段第一句“Today, Chongyang Festival is also a special day for people to show their respect to the elderly.”可知，现在人们在重阳节都会表达对长辈的爱和尊敬。
item.stem: What do people usually do on Chongyang Festival now?

item.analyze:
您选择的答案：

正确答案：C

主旨大意题。本文主要讲述了重阳节的来历，故C项为最佳标题。
item.stem: What’s the best title for the passage?

questionInfo.stem:
Chongyang Festival is also called Double Ninth Festival. People often climb the mountains and enjoy the beautiful scenery. People also eat Chongyang cake on that day.
The festival came from an old story. Long ago, a monster in the river made villagers ill. So Huan Jing, a brave boy, went to visit a master. The master said, “Tomorrow is the ninth day of September and the monster will come out of the river. You should stop it.” Huan Jing went home and told the villagers to climb up a mountain with a special plant on their clothes. The monster came out of the water the next day. When it climbed the mountain, the monster smelt the special plant and became dizzy(眩晕的). Then, Huan Jing killed it. Since then, climbing mountains on the day of Chongyang Festival has become popular.
Today, Chongyang Festival is also a special day for people to show their respect to the elderly. On this day, why not spend a day with your parents or grandparents?

item.questionSubject:
学校环保周的主题是“One Earth, One World”。为此，学生会准备举办一次英语征文活动，征文的题目是“What Can We Do for Wildlife?”。请根据下面的提示并结合自己所学的内容，写一篇征文，表达自己的建议。

要求：1. 覆盖要点，并补充两点建议；
2. 70词左右,征文的开头已给出，不计入总词数。
What Can We Do for Wildlife?
It’s hard for wildlife to survive in the wild because of people. I think all of us should do something to protect wildlife.
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
item.questionAnalysis:
What Can We Do for Wildlife?
It’s hard for wildlife to survive in the wild because of people. I think all of us should do something to protect wildlife.
I think, first of all, people should stop cutting down trees. Trees mean a lot of things to us. And we should build nature reserves for wild animals. And it’s also very important to say no to illegal hunting. I think the government should do something to make more people understand the importance of protecting wildlife. As students, we can do something, too. For example, we can ask our parents to stop buying clothes made of animal fur. We can also plant trees with our friends.

questionInfo.analyze:
What Can We Do for Wildlife?
It’s hard for wildlife to survive in the wild because of people. I think all of us should do something to protect wildlife.
I think, first of all, people should stop cutting down trees. Trees mean a lot of things to us. And we should build nature reserves for wild animals. And it’s also very important to say no to illegal hunting. I think the government should do something to make more people understand the importance of protecting wildlife. As students, we can do something, too. For example, we can ask our parents to stop buying clothes made of animal fur. We can also plant trees with our friends.

要求：1. 覆盖要点，并补充两点建议；
2. 70词左右,征文的开头已给出，不计入总词数。
What Can We Do for Wildlife?
